channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoho CRM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoho CRM -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-41978|2024-08-03T12:56:39.117Z -- zoho%20crm -- zoho%20crm%20lead%20magnet%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Arbitrary Options Update vulnerability in Zoho CRM Lead Magnet plugin <= 1.7.5.8 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-38696|2024-08-02T04:19:19.428Z -- zoho%20crm -- zoho%20crm%20lead%20magnet
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Zoho CRM Zoho CRM Lead Magnet allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Zoho CRM Lead Magnet: from n/a through 1.7.8.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Zoho CRM Zoho CRM Lead Magnet allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Zoho CRM Lead Magnet: from n/a through 1.7.8.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Zoho CRM Zoho CRM Lead Magnet allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Zoho CRM Lead Magnet: from n/a through 1.7.8.8.
